name: No-How
description:
Drawing is hard.

Created independently for the 2020 UMBC + UMD + AACC Fall Jam, No-How draws heavily from I Don't Even Game. If you've ever played that little Flash game online as a kid, then that should tell you all you need to know. Theme: Deprivation.

"Art" made with Aseprite. Everything else made with Godot.

I'm sorry.
